LITTLE ROCK CENTRAL HIGH SCHOOL NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE BOUNDARY MODIFICATION ACT

extension.searchTitle: LITTLE ROCK CENTRAL HIGH SCHOOL NATIONAL HISTORIC SITE BOUNDARY MODIFICATION ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 147

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site Boundary Modification Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 2611, to modify the boundary of the Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site, by a 2/3 yea-and-nay vote of 390 yeas with none voting ``nay'', Roll No. 485.
